author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hindu Business Line in association with ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund is organizing a programme on ‘Begin your financial journey with a sound investment in knowledge’ on February 20 at 6.30 p.m. at Hotel Cenneys Gateway.

Experts will provide valuable insights and direction towards planning ones investments towards the future of fulfilling their financial dreams.

For registration call, 098216-73157 or 098701-31013 or email to

veerendra.kembrekar@

thehindu.co.inor

shalini.lad@

thehindu.co.in. Those interested can register themselves on the spot and attend the programme.
title: Programme on investor education
